data.message: 😀😃  Awesome image frightens all rappers I think Eminem will read all the comments in order to know everything about you all because all these comments are not trivial but help to take a picture of the reality of society I love Eminem and listen to him the length of my life It is in my heart and my dream to get on A call to come to him and work at him in anything I am without a guest and I am his biggest fan I do everything for him I always remind you and destroy your enemies How will I meet you How to feel crying I am lonely☹️
